content: When I was a kid, my grandpa taught me a method to save on toilet paper. 1.Take one square of toilet paper. 2.Fold the square into fourths. 3.Tear off a small section of the corner, so as to creat a hole in the center of the square. 4.Insert finger into hole. 5.Wipe. 6.Remove square from finger, wiping it along the way.

content: quote: The Times reported the Academy Awards ceremony last weekend used 100 percent recycled toilet paper Recycled toilet paper???? Toilet paper reused after the first wipe??? I'll never touch the stuff. If I remember correctly the wood pulp used for making toilet paper and other paper products is made from the tailings left over from lumber production. A good log that can be turned into lumber or vinear would never be used to make toilet paper.
